verses.verse: Then all the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the forces <S%H2428><s%>, and Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%>, and Jezaniah <S%H3153><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hoshaiah <S%H1955><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> from the least <S%H6996><s%> even unto the greatest <S%H1419><s%>, came near <S%H5066><s%>,

that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> may show <S%H5046><s%> us the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein we should walk <S%H3212><s%>, and the thing <S%H1697><s%> that we should do <S%H6213><s%>.

Then Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8085><s%>, I have heard you <S%H6419><s%>; behold, I will pray unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> according to your words <S%H1697><s%>; and it shall come to pass that whatsoever thing <S%H1697><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall answer <S%H6030><s%> you <S%H5046><s%>, I will declare it unto you <S%H4513><s%>; I will keep nothing <S%H1697><s%> back from you <S%H4513><s%>.

Then they said <S%H559><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> be a true <S%H571><s%> and faithful <S%H539><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> amongst us <S%H6213><s%>, if we do not according to all the word <S%H1697><s%> wherewith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall send thee to us <S%H7971><s%>.

Whether it be good <S%H2896><s%>, or whether it be evil <S%H7451><s%>, we will obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, to whom we <S%H580><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> thee <S%H3190><s%>; that it may be well with us <S%H8085><s%>, when we obey the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.
And it came to pass after <S%H7093><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>.

Then called <S%H7121><s%> he Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%>, and all the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the forces <S%H2428><s%> that were with him <S%H5971><s%>, and all the people from the least <S%H6996><s%> even to the greatest <S%H1419><s%>,

and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, unto whom ye sent <S%H7971><s%> me to present <S%H5307><s%> your supplication <S%H8467><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%>:

If ye will still <S%H7725><s%> abide <S%H3427><s%> in this land <S%H776><s%>, then will I build <S%H1129><s%> you <S%H2040><s%>, and not pull you down, and I will plant <S%H5193><s%> you <S%H5428><s%>, and not pluck you up; for I repent <S%H5162><s%> me of the evil <S%H7451><s%> that I have done unto you <S%H6213><s%>.

Be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, of whom <S%H6440><s%> ye are afraid <S%H3373><s%>; be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of him <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: for I am with you to save <S%H3467><s%> you <S%H5337><s%>, and to deliver you from his hand <S%H3027><s%>.
And I will grant <S%H5414><s%> you mercy <S%H7356><s%>, that he may have mercy <S%H7355><s%> upon you <S%H7725><s%>, and cause you to return to your own land <S%H127><s%>.
But if ye say <S%H559><s%>, We will not dwell <S%H3427><s%> in this land <S%H776><s%>; so that ye obey <S%H8085><s%> not the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>,

saying <S%H559><s%>, No <S%H935><s%>; but we will go into the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, where we shall see <S%H7200><s%> no war <S%H4421><s%>, nor hear <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, nor have hunger <S%H7456><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>; and there will we dwell <S%H3427><s%>:

now therefore hear <S%H8085><s%> ye the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, O remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>: Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, If ye indeed <S%H7760><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your faces <S%H6440><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and go <S%H935><s%> to sojourn there <S%H1481><s%>;

then it shall come to pass <S%H2719><s%>, that the sword, which ye fear <S%H3373><s%>, shall overtake <S%H5381><s%> you there in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and the famine <S%H7458><s%>, whereof ye are afraid <S%H1672><s%>, shall follow hard <S%H1692><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you there in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and there ye shall die <S%H4191><s%>.

So shall it be with all the men <S%H582><s%> that set <S%H7760><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> there <S%H4191><s%>: they shall die by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, by the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and by the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>; and none of them shall remain <S%H8300><s%> or escape <S%H6412><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> that I will bring upon them <S%H935><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: As mine anger <S%H639><s%> and my wrath <S%H2534><s%> hath been poured forth <S%H5413><s%> upon the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, so shall my wrath <S%H2534><s%> be poured forth <S%H5413><s%> upon you <S%H935><s%>, when ye shall enter into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and ye shall be an execration <S%H423><s%>, and an astonishment <S%H8047><s%>, and a curse <S%H7045><s%>, and a reproach <S%H2781><s%>; and ye shall see <S%H7200><s%> this place no more <S%H4725><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> concerning you <S%H7611><s%>, O remnant of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, Go <S%H935><s%> ye not into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: know <S%H3045><s%> certainly <S%H3045><s%> that I have testified <S%H5749><s%> unto you this day <S%H3117><s%>.

For ye have dealt deceitfully <S%H8582><s%> against your own souls <S%H5315><s%>; for ye sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Pray <S%H6419><s%> for us unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>; and according unto all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, so declare <S%H5046><s%> unto us <S%H6213><s%>, and we will do it:

and I have this day <S%H3117><s%> declared <S%H5046><s%> it to you <S%H8085><s%>; but ye have not obeyed the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in anything for which he hath sent me unto you <S%H7971><s%>.

Now therefore know <S%H3045><s%> certainly <S%H3045><s%> that ye shall die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, by the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and by the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, in the place <S%H4725><s%> whither ye desire <S%H2654><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> to sojourn there <S%H1481><s%>.
